questions.question_text: Which of the following is MOST likely to deter an employee from engaging in inappropriate use of company-owned IT systems?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B. Communication of employee activity monitoring. Keywords are monitoring and deterrence.

Selected Answer: B
Of the options provided, choice B - "Communication of employee activity monitoring" - would likely be the most effective deterrent to inappropriate use of company IT systems by employees.

The reason is that making employees aware that their activity is being actively monitored creates accountability. Employees would know that inappropriate browsing, downloading, or other system misuse could be discovered through monitoring. This knowledge creates a risk of disciplinary action if caught, deterring misconduct.
